column1: Smoque BBQ////The place itself is fairly small
column2: about 15 tables total.  I went at 11:30a thinking i'd beat the lunch rush and there was a line about 5 deep...no worries right?  Well
column3: not really.  Apparently some jack-arse ahead of me ordered
column5: no less than 20 different things; he walked out with five gianormous bags of food...totally cluster-f'd everything up.  I ended up getting my order at just after Noon and by this time the queue was at least 20 deep with patrons quite visibly annoyed. oh well
